sentence.text: In proximal renal tubules, FGF23 suppresses the membrane expression of the sodium-phosphate cotransporters Npt2a and Npt2c which mediate urinary reabsorption of filtered phosphate.
In addition, FGF23 suppresses proximal tubular expression of 1Î±-hydroxylase, the key enzyme responsible for vitamin D hormone production.
In distal renal tubules, FGF23 signaling activates with-no-lysine kinase 4, leading to increased renal tubular reabsorption of calcium and sodium.
